Name: enforce_worker_email
Description: All workers must have valid email

Name: limit_team_size
Description: Ensure team size does not exceed 12

Name: require_sprint_goal
Description: Every sprint must have a defined goal

Name: ensure_task_status
Description: All tasks must have a status

Name: require_product_owner
Description: Each project must have a product owner

Name: ensure_release_status
Description: All release plans must have current status

Name: require_skill_certification
Description: Skill must be certified for critical roles

Name: enforce_roadmap_dates
Description: Roadmap must have start and end dates

Name: require_blocker_resolution
Description: All high-severity blockers must be resolved

Name: ensure_documentation_author
Description: All feature docs must have an author
